text: Hell on Devil's Island is a 1957 American adventure drama movie directed by Christian Nyby and starring Helmut Dantine, William Talman, Donna Martell, Jean Willes, Jay Adler, Rex Ingram. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1957 drama movies Category:1957 adventure movies Category:1950s American adventure movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies set on islands
title: Hell on Devil's Island
